gwt.g3d.client.gl2.WebGLBuffer

Packages that use WebGLBuffer
gwt.g3d.client.gl2 Contains wrappers for WebGL (OpenGL ES 2.0). 
gwt.g3d.client.mesh Contains helper classes for managing a mesh. 
 

Uses of WebGLBuffer in gwt.g3d.client.gl2
 

Methods in gwt.g3d.client.gl2 that return WebGLBuffer
 WebGLBuffer GL2Impl.createBuffer()
           
 WebGLBuffer GL2.createBuffer()
          Create a WebGLBuffer object and initialize it with a buffer object name as if by calling glGenBuffers.
 

Methods in gwt.g3d.client.gl2 with parameters of type WebGLBuffer

 void GL2.bindBuffer(BufferTarget target, WebGLBuffer buffer)
          Bind a named buffer object.
 void GL2Impl.deleteBuffer(WebGLBuffer buffer)
           
 void GL2.deleteBuffer(WebGLBuffer buffer)
          Delete the buffer object contained in the passed WebGLBuffer as if by calling glDeleteBuffers.
 

Uses of WebGLBuffer in gwt.g3d.client.mesh
